original_text: All the holy contributions that the people of Israel present to the Lord I give to you, and to your sons and daughters with you, as a perpetual due. It is a covenant of salt forever before the Lord for you and for your offspring with you.”
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와께 거제로 드리는 모든 성물은 내가 영구한 몫의 음식으로 너와 네 자녀에게 주노니 이는 여호와 앞에 너와 네 후손에게 영원한 소금 언약이니라

sentences.original_text: that the people of Israel present to the Lord
and to your sons and daughters with you
sentences.korean_translation: 너와 함께 있는 네 아들딸에게도 주라

sentences.original_text: It is a covenant of salt
for you and for your offspring with you.
